languages.text: "О, госпожа, мои слова вас расстроили? Уверяю, скорее всего ваш сородич был бы счастлив, узнай он, что из его останков хотят сделать прелестное пресс-папье! Ну и в конце концов, я могу ошибаться о природе его происхождения..."

"Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty presse-papier out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."
languages.original_text: "О, госпожа, мои слова вас расстроили? Уверяю, скорее всего ваш сородич был бы счастлив, узнай он, что из его останков хотят сделать прелестное пресс-папье! Ну и в конце концов, я могу ошибаться о природе его происхождения..."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty papier-mâché out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."

"Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty papier-mâché out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."

"Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty presse-papier out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."

languages.text: “噢，女士，是我的话让你不舒服了吗？人们想把你的亲人的遗骨做成漂亮的书镇。我很确信，如果他泉下有知，一定会很开心的。而且，也有可能是我搞错了他的身世……”
languages.original_text: "Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty presse-papier out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."

traits.locale_text: “噢，女士，是我的话让你不舒服了吗？人们想把你的亲人的遗骨做成漂亮的书镇。我很确信，如果他泉下有知，一定会很开心的。而且，也有可能是我搞错了他的身世……”

languages.text: «Oh, señora, ¿la han ofendido mis palabras? ¡Pensé que a su compatriota le encantaría descubrir que la gente quiere fabricar pisapapeles con sus restos! Y además, podría equivocarme respecto a sus orígenes...».
languages.original_text: "Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty presse-papier out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, señora, ¿la han ofendido mis palabras? ¡Pensé que a su compatriota le encantaría descubrir que la gente quiere fabricar pisapapeles con sus restos! Y además, podría equivocarme respecto a sus orígenes...».

languages.text: 「おや、マダム、私の言葉に動揺しましたか？ご親族のご遺体をすてきなペーパーウェイトに仕上げるよう人々が望んでると聞けば、故人もお喜びになるはずです！それに、私は先祖の気質を誤解していたようでして…」
languages.original_text: "Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty presse-papier out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."

traits.locale_text: 「おや、マダム、私の言葉に動揺しましたか？ご親族のご遺体をすてきなペーパーウェイトに仕上げるよう人々が望んでると聞けば、故人もお喜びになるはずです！それに、私は先祖の気質を誤解していたようでして…」

languages.text: "Oh, Madame, haben meine Wort Euch verstimmt? Ich bin sicher, Euer Volksgenosse wäre erfreut, dass andere aus seinen Überresten hübsche Briefbeschwerer machen wollen! Und außerdem könnte ich mich natürlich irren, was seine Herkunft angeht ..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty presse-papier out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Madame, haben meine Wort Euch verstimmt? Ich bin sicher, Euer Volksgenosse wäre erfreut, dass andere aus seinen Überresten hübsche Briefbeschwerer machen wollen! Und außerdem könnte ich mich natürlich irren, was seine Herkunft angeht ..."

languages.text: « Oh, mes propos vous ont-ils offensée, madame ? Je suis certain que votre semblable serait ravi d'apprendre que quelqu'un a trouvé son crâne si beau qu'il a décidé d'en faire un presse-papier ! De plus, il est possible que je me trompe quant à ses origines... »
languages.original_text: "Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty presse-papier out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."

languages.text: "Sözlerim hanımefendilerini üzdü mü? Akrabanız, kalıntılarından güzel bir kâğıt tutacağı yapılacağını öğrenmekten bahtiyar olurdu eminim! Menşe hakkında yanılıyor olabilirim pek tabii."
languages.original_text: "Oh, madam, have my words upset you? I'm certain your kinsman would be delighted to learn that people wish to make pretty presse-papier out of his remains! And besides, I could be wrong about the nature of his origins..."
